context: The Estonian word 'üksused' is the plural form of 'üksus', which means 'unit' or 'single item'. It refers to individual entities, components, or distinct elements that make up a larger whole. The word can be used in various contexts such as military units (sõjaväe üksused), measurement units (mõõtühikud), or simply referring to individual items or people (üksikisendid).
